pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030 / RX 550
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Debian 10, Ubuntu 18.04 or other modern distribution with glibc version of 2.27 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030 / RX 550
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
